edl.name: UGS.Candidacy.Form
edl.title: UGS - Nomination to Candidacy

validation.expression: (((wf:field('minor1') != 'Select') and not(wf:empty(wf:field('committeeMinorRep1Name')))) or ((wf:field('minor1') = 'Select') and wf:empty(wf:field('committeeMinorRep1Name'))) or (wf:empty(wf:field('committeeMinorRep1Name')) and wf:empty(wf:field('minor1'))))
validation.message: Please enter a Name or Minor

validation.expression: (((wf:field('minor2') != 'Select') and not(wf:empty(wf:field('committeeMinorRep2Name')))) or ((wf:field('minor2') = 'Select') and wf:empty(wf:field('committeeMinorRep2Name'))) or (wf:empty(wf:field('committeeMinorRep2Name')) and wf:empty(wf:field('minor2'))))
validation.message: Please enter a Name or Minor

validation.expression: ((wf:field('department1') != 'Select') and (wf:field('department2') != 'Select') and (wf:field('minor1') != 'Select')) or ((wf:field('department1') != 'Select') and (wf:field('department2') != 'Select') and (wf:field('minor1') = 'Select')) or ((wf:field('department1') != 'Select') and (wf:field('department2') = 'Select') and (wf:field('minor1') != 'Select')) or ((wf:field('department1') = 'BL-SPPP') and (wf:field('minor1') = 'Select')) or ((wf:field('department1') = 'BL-SPPP') and (wf:field('minor1') != 'Select'))

(((wf:field('minor2') != 'Select') and not(wf:empty(wf:field('committeeMinorRep2NetId')))) or ((wf:field('minor2') = 'Select') and wf:empty(wf:field('committeeMinorRep2NetId'))) or (wf:empty(wf:field('committeeMinorRep2NetId')) and wf:empty(wf:field('minor2'))))
validation.message: Please enter a Minor Representative or Minor

validation.expression: (((wf:field('minor1') != 'Select') and not(wf:empty(wf:field('committeeMinorRep1NetId')))) or ((wf:field('minor1') = 'Select') and wf:empty(wf:field('committeeMinorRep1NetId'))) or (wf:empty(wf:field('committeeMinorRep1NetId')) and wf:empty(wf:field('minor1'))))
validation.message: Please enter a Minor Representative or Minor

validation.expression: (((wf:field('department2') != 'Select' and not(wf:field('major2') = 'Select'))) or (wf:field('department2') = 'Select' and not(wf:field('major2') = 'Select')) or (wf:field('department2') = 'Select' and (wf:field('major2') = 'Select')) or (wf:field('department2') = 'Select' and wf:empty(wf:field('major2'))))

validation.message: University ID must be 10 digits beginning with zeros

xsl:variable.name: isAtCommitteeDeptbNodes

td.font: ***Your Nomination to Candidacy Form has not yet been submitted. Please fill out all required fields below, fix any errors, and submit it.***

Your Nomination to Candidacy Form has been submitted for review and approval. Refer to the student reference on the University Graduate School page in OneStart to learn how to track your document. You may now close this window.

No action taken.
Departmental Approver - Please make a selection at the bottom of the form.

No selection made yet.
Please make a selection at the bottom of the form.

No Action Taken
Approver for the Major listed - Please complete the "Questions to be completed by the School or Department" section.

No Action Taken
Approver for First Minor listed - Please make a selection for the 'Outside Minor Examination' in the Minor Representative(s) section

No Action Taken
Approver for Advisory Committee - Please review and make a selection at the bottom of the edoc.

No Action Taken
Approver for Second Minor listed - Please make a selection for the 'Outside Minor Examination' in the Minor Representative(s) section

font.b: Nomination to Candidacy of the Ph.D. Degree

td.br: Enter a dot if no middle name
Enter a dot if no middle name

td.font: If you have selected a single major, you must choose a minor and indicate a minor representative below. If you are a dual major PhD student, a minor is not required.
If you have a committee member that is both the first major and a minor representative, please list that person in both sections.
To be Completed by The Minor Representative

font.b: Questions to be completed by the School or Department

td.font: An exception has been granted for this application. Please ensure the appropriate documentation is attached and details are included in the notes section below.

Documents should be attached to a note in the "Create Note" section at the bottom of this form.
Click the "browse" button to search for your document, after you've selected it, click the "save" button that is to the right of the note. A new "note" box will pull in after saving. There can only be one attachment per note, but you can create multiple notes.

b.font: This form is being refreshed. Please wait.

h2.font: You are not authorized to view this document.
